properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 6 at 3:52PM EST until January 7 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 10 to 15 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 1 to 3 feet expected. For the
Gale Watch, northwest winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt
and seas 4 to 6 feet possible.

* WHERE...Nantucket Sound.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 7 PM this evening to
8 AM EST Tuesday. For the Gale Watch, from Wednesday afternoon
through Thursday morning.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM EST TUESDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING
